channel.title: Project Polish <33 Wewt FTW
channel.description:
Hello everyone :) , I Teh Polak will be starting a project. Due to the fact some of the servers I use bore the hell out of me. So something new I never tried will be fun! The project will involve many jobs , and you will experience different things. You might know some things we will be talking about and some things you won't know. We don't want coders that just code , we want coders that can have a good time , make people laugh atleast. So if you think you got the guts to join this project , cmon in and join!
[u]The Jobs That You Can Have![/u] 1. Coder 2. Administator on game 3. Moderator on game 4. Administator on forums 5. Moderator on forums 6. Client maker 7. Client Designer 8. Idea Maker 9. Tester
[u]The definitions of jobs that you can have![/u]
Coder - Will code for the server and try to improve the server as much as possible. Will get idea's from Idea makers and tester will test your codes to see if the work as they should. Simple as that.
Administrator on game - Will help the players with their choosing. No spawning for them as in no giving out free stuff. If player does not obbey to what you commanded them , please kick them. If they do not listen give them a mute , and if that doesn't work get a ban. Anything else further will go through me and my choosing of IPBan or ect.
Moderator on game - Will help the players with their choosing. Will kick if misbehaving and ect. May mute if your insulted in a way. Report to an administrator if anything worse happens. If the administrator can not stop him , please tell me on msn , forums , or anyway you can reach me.
Administator on forums - Will keep the forum stable. Make sure no flaming , spamming ect. If the player is misbehaving give him a warning , moderated or a mute. Even ban if needbe.
Moderator on forums - Will do the same as an administrator but please make sure you don't flame.
Client Maker - Will make a client (377 cache would be fine) to allow the players to play on. Please put your effort into it and no random things thank you.
Client Designer - Will design the client to make it look interesting to use. Anything that can inspire the person to actually use it would be great just none of these can be the picture : Porn , another servers name , or any other unreasonable things. Abuse your power and you will be fired immediately.
Idea Maker - Will make idea's for the server. All idea's must go through me or an administrator. Please follow this. If you tell the coder to code something you want and we don't know , you will be fired and the code will be deleted at once.
Tester - Will test if the coder's code actually worked . Due to specails , commands , ect.
Those are the jobs that you can have right now. If you have any interest in one of these jobs please keep reading . Thank you :)
[u]Coder Form[/u] Username : Why do you want this job ? : Will you follow my rules ? : How long have you been coding ? : Rate yourself : * / 10 Accept -- Decline --
[u]Moderator/Administator Form on the game![/u] Username : What job : Why do you want this job? : Will you follow the rules ? : Experience in this job : Accept -- Decline --
[u]Moderator/Administrator Form on the forums![/u] Username : What job : Why do you want this job ? : Will you mute/warn/moderate people when needbe? : Experience of this job : Will you follow the rules ? : Accept -- Decline --
[u]Client Maker Form[/u] Username : Why do you want this job ? : What experience do you have in this ? : What type of cache can you make ? : Will you follow the rules ? : Accept -- Decline --
[u]Client Designer Form[/u] Username : Why do you want this job : Experience : What can you add to make it awesome ? : Accept -- Decline --
[u]Idea Maker Form[/u] Username : Why do you want this job : What will you think of? Are you a good person to think of imaginated things? Accept -- Decline --[br][size=1]Posted on: August 10, 2007, 11:19:49 AM[/size][hr][u]Tester Form[/u] Username : Why do you want this job : Experience : Will you be on most of the time ? : Accept -- Decline --
Now that i'm done with the jobs time to show the rankings of jobs! There color coded :P
Level 1 - Yellow Level 2 - Red Level 3 - Orange Level 4 - Purple Level 5 - Maroon Level 6 - Blue Level 7 - Brown Level 8 - Teal Level 9 - Green
Time to explain which each level represents!
Level 1 : A slacked off coder Level 2 : A coder that knows what he's doing Level 3 : A good coder but a slacker Level 4 : Experienced coder Level 5 : Awesome coder Level 6 : GREAT Coder Level 7 : Co-Master coder Level 8 : Master coder Level 9 : Legend Coder
See who's on the job !!
[center]Administrator on game P I M P 3 D Tut Frugoo Scape Sick Of Air trackerofdeath4500 (no clue what to rank) ----
Mod on game I Iced I --- ---
Administrator on forum Frugoo Scape Sick Of Air ---
Moderator on forum I Iced I --- ---
Coder P I M P 3 D Tut Frugoo Scape --- --- ---
Client Maker ----
Client Designer --- --- ---
Tester --- --- --- ---
Idea Maker --- --- --- --- ---[/center] Hope you can join , cya!
Project Polak Ftw
You may post
Server Percent Complete : 9% Forum Completion : 90 Percent Forum Link : Will release in 5-10 Days :o

item.title: Project Polish <33 Wewt FTW
item.dc:creator: @Steviie Steviie
item.description:
@Steviie wrote:

Username : Ferrari
What job : Administrator/Moderator. (I don’t mind, but i prefer admin)
Why do you want this job ? : I would like to help you out, keep your server running, help other players etc.
Will you mute/warn/moderate people when needbe? : Yes, I will do my job, first warning, if they continue to misbehave, i’ll kick/ban.
Experience of this job : I’ve been admin in a couple of servers, did a good job. I’ve also been mod in other servers, also did a good job.
Will you follow the rules ? : Of course And I’ll remind people of the rules also, I’ll tell them they need to follow the rules at all times or it will result in kick/ban.

Read full topic

@Teh_Polak wrote:

Hello everyone , I Teh Polak will be starting a project. Due to the fact some of the servers I use bore the hell out of me. So something new I never tried will be fun! The project will involve many jobs , and you will experience different things. You might know some things we will be talking about and some things you won’t know. We don’t want coders that just code , we want coders that can have a good time , make people laugh atleast. So if you think you got the guts to join this project , cmon in and join!

The Jobs That You Can Have!

  1. Coder
  2. Administator on game
  3. Moderator on game
  4. Administator on forums
  5. Moderator on forums

The definitions of jobs that you can have!

Coder - Will code for the server and try to improve the server as much as possible. Will get idea’s from Idea makers and tester will test your codes to see if the work as they should. Simple as that.

Administrator on game - Will help the players with their choosing. No spawning for them as in no giving out free stuff. If player does not obbey to what you commanded them , please kick them. If they do not listen give them a mute , and if that doesn’t work get a ban. Anything else further will go through me and my choosing of IPBan or ect.

Moderator on game - Will help the players with their choosing. Will kick if misbehaving and ect. May mute if your insulted in a way. Report to an administrator if anything worse happens. If the administrator can not stop him , please tell me on msn , forums , or anyway you can reach me.

Administator on forums - Will keep the forum stable. Make sure no flaming , spamming ect. If the player is misbehaving give him a warning , moderated or a mute. Even ban if needbe.

Moderator on forums - Will do the same as an administrator but please make sure you don’t flame.

Client Maker - Will make a client (377 cache would be fine) to allow the players to play on. Please put your effort into it and no random things thank you.

Client Designer - Will design the client to make it look interesting to use. Idea Maker - Will make idea’s for the server. All idea’s must go through me or an administrator. Please follow this. If you tell the coder to code something you want and we don’t know , you will be fired and the code will be deleted at once.

Tester - Will test if the coder’s code actually worked . Due to specails , commands , ect.
